lyrics:
Like fire tonight
You light up the sky
You are the power, you heat up my heart
Desire tonight
Our love make us fly
We are like fire tonight
Oh yeah
You are my sunshine
My light bright in day
Incredible passion to show me the way
My body's on fire it's burning so hot
Every day, every night
I hold you tight
Every day, every night
I hold you tight
Life, this is your time
The party is out there and waiting for you
Oh life, come out and dance
You are the one so come take your chance
Like fire tonight
You light up the sky
You are the power, you heat up my heart
Desire tonight
Our love make us fly
We are like fire tonight
When we're together
I'm feeling so strong
Enormous emotion, yeah, all night long
I'm here to please you, I am your man
Every day, every night
I hold you tight
Life, this is your time
The party is out there and waiting for you
Oh life, come out and dance
You are the one so come take your chance
Like fire tonight
You light up the sky
You are the power, you heat up my heart
Desire tonight
Our love make us fly
We are like fire tonight
Like fire tonight
You light up the sky
You are the power, you heat up my heart
Desire tonight
Our love make us fly
We are like fire tonight
You are the power, you heat up my heart
Desire tonight
Our love make us fly
We are like fire
We are like fire
We are like fire tonight
